Wagner Labor ArchiveElmer Holmes Bobst Library70 Washington Square South10th FloorNew York, NY 10012(212) 998-2630tamiment.wagner@nyu.eduThis finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2019-04-01T14:45:43Finding aid written in EnglishDescribing Archives: A Content StandardFebruary 2019
Edited by Amy C. Vo
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Archives of Irish America Collection on The Quiet Man
Archives of Irish America
AIA.042
7 Linear Feet in 3 film canisters, 1 oversize folder, and 2 oversize posters.
1952, 1992 Materials are stored off-site and advance notice is required for use. Please contact tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu at least two days prior to research visit. The materials in this collection were collected and assembled by the staff of the Archives of Irish America and various donors in an attempt to document ethnic and cultural aspects of the 1952 John Ford film, The Quiet Man. The collection includes an original 35mm print and an oversized theater poster of the film. Materials are in English.
Audiovisual Access Policies and Procedures
Audiovisual materials have not been preserved and may not be available to researchers. Materials not yet digitized will need to have access copies made before they can be used. To request an access copy, or if you are unsure if an item has been digitized, please contact tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu, (212) 998-2630 with the collection name, collection number, and a description of the item(s) requested. A staff member will respond to you with further information.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Archives of Irish America Collection on The Quiet Man; AIA 042; box number; folder number; Archives of Irish America, Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
The provenance of the materials in this collection is unknown. The accession number associated with the materials is 1997.033.
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection are held by the creator. Permission to publish or reproduce materials to which s/he holds copyright must be secured from the copyright holder.
Existence and Location of Copies
A DVD version of the film is available in the Avery Fisher Center for Music and Media: DVD 9699.
Scope and Contents
This collection consists of memorabilia related to John Ford's 1952 film The Quiet Man. The collection includes an original 35mm print, an oversized theater poster of the film, and movie posters.
Arrangement
The order in which these materials were sent to the Tamiment Library has been maintained.
Historical Note
The materials in this collection were collected and assembled by the staff of the Archives of Irish America and various donors in an attempt to document ethnic and cultural aspects of the 1952 John Ford film, The Quiet Man.
Ireland -- In motion pictures. Feature films. film reels Film posters
